effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 434,629 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 231,026.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 924 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
